title: ALL SHORTCUTS (🔵 = is important, 🔴 = must overwrite important to work properly, but is not important)

manipulators.description: iTerm2 if copyMode = 1; Home -> 0 (Move to start of line)
iTerm2 if copyMode = 1; End -> $ (Move to end of line)
iTerm2 if copyMode = 1; Home+Shift -> 0 (Select and Move to start of line)
iTerm2 if copyMode = 1; End+Shift -> $ (Select and Move to end of line)
iTerm2 if copyMode = 1; Esc -> Esc+Esc (Exit and Reset)
iTerm2 map cmd+d to select word in copy mode
Disable r_cmd if pressed alone. Prevent random cmd triggering and better cmd+space behavior
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end -> start/end of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end -> start/end of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
Browser, Telegram, Bitwarden home/end+shift -> start/end select of row
caps_lock to dual role: escape and hyper

to.description: Control Window Management: check if caps_lock is pressed
Finder: Use Esc to finish renaming when onEdit=1

manipulators.description: move window left, if hyper = 1 (caps_lock pressed)
move window right, if hyper = 1 (caps_lock pressed)

rules.description2: Switch super+cmd/opt+shift+j/; -> opt/cmd+shift+arrow_keys. Issue: need to set arrow + cmd/cmd+shft... to work as opt/opt+shift to jump on words, because MacOS by defualt jump on words is different from Windows. This must be before 'Set jkl; to arrows', because it have to be triggered first.

HISTORY INFO ONLY ! Instead of simply mapping m,./ to page_keys, we must declare home/end functionality alone, to make it function properly. I.e. 'm' -> 'left + cmd' to go to start of a row etc. This due macOS functioning different then Windows. Also lcmd+rcmd+comma (also 'nm,./[]' ) -> not work because of hardware limitation, see N-key rollover https://karabiner-elements.pqrs.org/docs/help/troubleshooting/cannot-use-some-key-combination

rules.description: 🔵 3 Finder modification to work as Windows File Explorer

manipulators.description: Use Return as Open by defalut (if not renaming file), when onEdit=0
Use SECOND Return as Open by defalut (if not renaming file), when onEdit=0
Use Return to finish renaming when onEdit=1
Use SECOND Return to finish renaming when onEdit=1
Use F2 as Rename and set onEdit=1
Go to... cmd+l -> cmd+g and set onEdit=1
Use Backspace as Go to Enclosing Folder if onEdit=0
Use super+backspace -> cmd+backspace (del) to Move to Bin if onEdit=0
Paste cmd+v when cutMode=1 and set cutMode=0
SECOND Delete word backward cmd+spacebar -> opt+backspace
Fix Switch input source when holding opt and rapid typed comma + spacebar
Open dev tools in browser cmd+shift+i -> cmd+opt+i
Move back in history opt+left; super+h -> cmd+[
Move forward in history opt+right; super+' -> cmd+]
Disable Quit App and remap cmd+q -> ctrl+q
Disable native Hide App cmd+h -> ctrl+h
Chnage ґ to ʼ in unkraine keyborad
Chnage Ґ to ~ in unkraine keyborad
Chnage ʼ to ґ in unkraine keyborad
Chnage ~ to Ґ  in unkraine keyborad
uk Fix comma and period fast typing in sequence
